interact.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if people interact with each other, they talk to each other, work together etc
interact.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Lucy interacts well with other children in the class.
interact.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if one thing interacts with another, or if they interact, they affect each other
interact.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The immune system interacts with both the nervous system and the hormones.
